title: India Caps Airfares as Indigo Cancels Nearly 850 Flights
description: India capped airline fares and expanded railway operations on Saturday to quell public anger after thousands were left stranded by flight cancellations.
content: India capped airline fares and expanded railway operations on Saturday to quell public anger after thousands were left stranded by flight cancellations.
